mainHero.title: Parhar
mainHero.subtitle: Inc.
mainHero.description: We specialize in delivering cutting-edge software solutions designed to transform your business. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, our team of experts works closely with clients to understand their unique needs, providing tailored software that drives efficiency, growth, and success.Whether you're a startup looking to scale, a mid-sized business aiming for digital transformation, or an enterprise in need of custom software development, we have the tools and expertise to help you succeed in an ever-evolving digital landscape.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
